Based on your preferences, I would recommend two movies from this list: "The Andromeda Strain" (1971) and "Aladdin" (1992). Both movies are suitable for adults and feature engaging plots and memorable characters.

"The Andromeda Strain" is a science fiction film that explores the implications of extraterrestrial life. The movie features stunning special effects, including computer-generated imagery (CGI)), as well as an engaging plot that keeps viewers on the edge of their seats.

In "Aladdin", a young boy named Aladdin discovers a mysterious lamp hidden inside his grandmother's garden. When Aladdin rubs the lamp, he is granted three wishes, but beware: any wish made in jest will instead fulfill the person's true desire.

With its heartwarming storyline and memorable characters, "Aladdin" is one of the most beloved animated movies of all time.
